snippet: Bayern Munich scored two more goals in extra time to complete a thrilling 4-2 home victory over Juventus on Wednesday that sent Bayern into the Champions League quarterfinals.
abstract: Soccer Roundup; Bayern Munich defeats Juventus, 4-2, to advance to Champions League quarterfinals; other soccer scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Bayern Munich scored two more goals in extra time to complete a thrilling 4-2 home victory over Juventus on Wednesday that sent Bayern into the Champions League quarterfinals.

headline.print_headline: 3 Late Goals Help Bayern Best Juventus
headline.main: 3 Late Goals Help Bayern Best Juventus
